links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
Index entries for sequences of the a(a(n)) = 2n family
formula: if n is a 4th power then a(n)=a(n^(1/4))^4, otherwise if the difference between n and the highest 4th power less than n is odd then a(n)=n+1, otherwise a(n)=(n-1)^4.
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = Which[r = n^(1/4); IntegerQ[r], a[r]^4, OddQ[n - Floor[r]^4], n+1, True, (n-1)^4]; a[0]=0; a[1]=1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 45}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 07 2012, after formula *)
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 27 2000
